page.title: 08Marhamchurch Revel
page.content: Everybody worries about the weather in August,for it's time for Marhamchurch Revel.We want a fine day at 2:30p.m. the procession begins .The flower girls,dancers,Queen,Marshall,Page-boy and band followed by the Fancy dress parade walk up the village. The Queen sits on a platform.Father Time crowns her then she declares the Revel open.She then mounts a white horse and rides around the village with everybody waving.She rides down into the school field where the Queen and her retinue sit on a decorated platform and watch over the fun. There are lots of stalls and everybody has agood time.In the Bray Institute there are cream teas,as theevening comes there are races and last of all there is a dance or disco.Everybody has a good day at the Revel.
